::Grounded::
Grounded jsut watches through the mist to see if Wildrider would be
affected by his little presents...




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Windlord:
>
> "Look out" said Windlord while he moved to a safe distance and looked
> what was going there.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded::
> > Grounded finally got his roots to his max of 200 m and moved to
> there
> > spourtiing up a few m behind Wildrider....he trnasformed and looked
> at
> > Wildrider and then looked down and stuck his finger into the ground
> > three more times....This time up grew a yellow rose a mushroom and
> > white rose....The white rose began to send false signals jsut in
> case
> > Wildrider tied to communicate or had sensors on him....The yellow
> rose
> > started to vibrate and make emit large soundwaves possibly screwing
> up
> > a bots balance or extremely hurting the hearing sensors....finally
> the
> > mushroom sprayed a white mist that would disable eye optics....As
> > these were put out two opticcovers slid over Grounded's eyes and two
> > more hearing cover slid over his sound inputs..He opened a comm link
> > to his new friend Windlord...."Stay a safe distance....i have quite
> a
> > storm brewing hear and you don't have your rain gear" he commanded
> as
> > the mixture of his mists swirled together and spread throught the
> sky....
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > OOC: I don't sure...
> > >
> > >
> > > Windlord continued firing against Wildrider

> > > >

> > > tremendous
> > > > boom that shook the ground. He had to shake off the hit of the
> > > ground
> > > > and he trnasformed to a plant and started shooting his roots out
> > > > behind of Wildrider
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >

> gracefully
> > > > > before the
